_computeAddress(bytes,bytes32).details: Computes the address for a contract to be deployed via CREATE2.

params._bytecode: The bytecode of the contract to be deployed.
params._salt: A bytes32 salt value used to compute the address.

returns._0: computedAddress The precomputed address of the contract if deployed with the provided bytecode and salt.

deploy(bytes,bytes32).details: Computes the address for a contract to be deployed via CREATE2, without actually deploying it.

params._bytecode: The bytecode of the contract to be deployed.
params._salt: A bytes32 salt value used to compute the address.

returns._0: computedAddress The precomputed address of the contract if deployed with the provided bytecode and salt.

initiateDeployment(bytes,bytes32).details: Public function to initiate the deployment of a contract.

params._bytecode: The bytecode of the contract to be deployed.
params._salt: A bytes32 salt value used to create a deterministic address.

returns._0: contractAddress The address of the deployed contract.
